title: History Extra podcast - March 2009 - Part 1
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - March 2009 - Part 1
itunes:subtitle: Hallie Rubehold reveals a remarkable tale of adultery that caused a scandal in the 18th century, David Hipshon speaks about the controversial king Richard III and his violent death at the Battle of Bosworth.
description:
Hallie Rubehold reveals a remarkable tale of adultery that caused a scandal in the 18th century, David Hipshon speaks about the controversial king Richard III and his violent death at the Battle of Bosworth.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
